nodes.text: Lina Mardec was a Human female. She lived in Jalor City with her husband Riic, a cab driver, and two daughters, Sale and Fora.
Unfortunately, on 2 ABY, the Mardecs—except for Riic—died in a crossfire when the Galactic Empire attacked a Rebel cell. The "collateral damage" could have happened due to Rebel or Imperial fire.
